sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for carrying out reactions under reflux conditions.
sections.scope: Applicable to chemical reactions performed under reflux in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry laboratory.
procedure: Assemble the reflux condenser setup securely.
Add reactants and solvent to the round bottom flask.
Connect the condenser and ensure proper water flow.
Heat the reaction mixture using a heating mantle.
After completion, switch OFF heating and allow cooling.
sections.precautions: Ensure tight connections. Do not allow condenser to run dry.
